body:
I love the artwork or artstyle whatever u call it😂....just writing a review to this piece.....
but, i kinda don't like the vampire😅...hope u make a ntr piece...dont judge me im not a sick person and im a student...its just...my fantasy on anime is...u know rofl😆😆
(why am i saying this😭)....btw where the freakkk is the author's tag of this masterpiece!??!?
